attributes.action: Eliminate clause on disability bus pass preventing use from before 9:30 Mon-Fri
attributes.background:
Please eliminate the “black out” hours for the disabilities concession metro pass. Users are prevented from using the pass before 9:30 Mon through Fri. 

Unfortunately, many places of employment start in the morning and travel is required before 9:30 in order to be prompt for attendance

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The rules on bus passes in your local area are usually the responsibility of your local council or local transport providers. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
